text: mariyu (punarut'thana dinamuna) i aparadhulu, tama prabhuvu samaksanlo, e vidhanga tama talalu vancukoni nilabadi untaro, nivu cudagaligite! Varu: "O ma prabhu! Memippudu cusamu mariyu vinnamu, kavuna mam'malni tirigi (bhulokaniki) pampincu. Memu satkaryalu cestamu, niscayanga, maku ippudu nam'makam kaligindi." Ani antaru
